actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to exercise authority under the Southern Nevada Public Land Management Act of 1998 to acquire by exchange certain environmentally sensitive lands for inclusion in the Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area.
short_title: Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area Expansion Act of 2000

summary.text: Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area Expansion Act of 2000 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to exercise authority under the Southern Nevada Public Land Management Act of 1998 to acquire by exchange certain environmentally sensitive lands for inclusion in the Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area.

titles.title: Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area Expansion Act of 2000

To direct the Secretary of the Interior to exercise authority under the Southern Nevada Public Land Management Act of 1998 to acquire by exchange certain environmentally sensitive lands for inclusion in the Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area.
